subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won his third Qatar Open title without dropping a set when he beat the defending champion, Nikolay Davydenko, 6-3, 6-4, in a 79-minute final Saturday.
snippet: Roger Federer won his third Qatar Open title without dropping a set when he beat the defending champion, Nikolay Davydenko, 6-3, 6-4, in a 79-minute final Saturday.
